headline: Workers At Boeing Mocked F.A.A.
abstract: The company expressed regret at the embarrassing communications it sent to investigators on Thursday, which included a comment that “this airplane is designed by clowns, who are in turn supervised by monkeys.”
lead_paragraph: Boeing employees mocked federal rules, talked about deceiving regulators and joked about potential flaws in the 737 Max as it was being developed, according to over a hundred pages of internal messages delivered Thursday to congressional investigators.
keywords: Boeing 737 Max Groundings and Safety Concerns (2019)
